featured.text: Dioxin travels by air currents and settles onto grass, which is then eaten by cows and chickens in their feed.
On a sunny afternoon last month, we all took off our shoes and walked on the grass with _____ feet.

definition.zh_def: 草本植物，通常生長在地面上，具有綠色的葉子和柔軟的莖。
definition.en_def: A common type of plant that has green leaves and soft stems, typically growing close to the ground.
definition.example: The children played on the grass in the park.
